{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 250AE.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = Enterprise Session Border Controller |caption2 = Wireless ADSL2+ Router with VoIP |pp = <!-- product page url only --> |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = Edgewater_Networks_EdgeMarc_250AE |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = Edgewater Networks |model = EdgeMarc 250 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = AE |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N300 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = X6G250 |icid = 5318A-250 |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8672P; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = Lexra LX5280 |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = <!-- 400 MHz --> |cpu2chip1 = Realtek;RTL8672PV; |cpu2_cores = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |cpu2_type = <!-- ARM,MIPS, --> |cpu2_type_rev = <!-- CPU2 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu2spd = <!-- CPU2 speed, MHz, GHz, Leave blank if unknown --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Macronix;MX25L12845EMI-10G; |flash1size = 16 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes --> |flash2type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla2_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla2chip = Macronix;MX25L3235DMI-10G; |flash2size = 32 |flash2maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Zentel;A3V56S40FTP-G6; |ram1_num = 2 |ram2type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram2type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram2spd = <!-- 3400,3333,3300,3200,3100,3000,2800,2666,2600,2400,2133,2000,1866,1600,1066,1333,800 --> |ram2size = 32 |ram2chip = Zentel;A3V56S40FTP-G6; |ram2_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8201EL; |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8370M; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 100MbE |lan_ports = 8 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = 00:19:15
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = 5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner = 2.1 |pwr_barrel_len = 9.5 |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = FXS, ADSL2+, VoIP, SNMP, |addchip = ADSL2+ Analog Front-End;Realtek;RTL8271B;;1;,,, FXS chip (Single ProSLIC);Silicon Labs;Si32176;;4;,,, FXO chip (Single ProSLIC);Silicon Labs;Si32919;;1;,,, 2A, 28V Step-Down Switching Regulator;SemtechSC4524A;;2;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;1;,,, 8-bit serial-in, parallel-out shift register;NXP;74HC164D;;1;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = default |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Tecom |manuf_model = 613-180702R |manuf_rev = V5 |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/26/2010 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B01LXMAZQ1 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = <!-- Radio module name, optional link, Leave blank for none --> |rad1modif = USB (module) |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8192SU; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *Integrated ADSL2+ DSL modem works with all ADSL providers :(''AT&T, Verizon, Centurylink, Qwest, Bell, Acanac, Teksavvy'') *Integrated 802.11bgn Wireless Router *Integrated 8 port managed Gigabit Ethernet switch with VLAN support. *Integrated VoIP (SIP and H.323) 4x FXS (RJ11) ports and 1 FXO (RJ11) port shared w/ ADSL2+. *Management: HTTP, HTTPS, SSH, Telnet, SNMPv1 and V3.
==Links of Interest== *[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/250/250_EWN_QSG.pdf Quick Start Guide] *[ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/250/EdgeMarc_250AE_Install.pdf Hardware Installation Guide] *[https://www.ultatel.com/content/manuals/edgewater/edgewater-networks-edgemarc-250ae-edgemarc-5-data-sheet.pdf Datasheet]
